structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 320, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 86, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 87; and ch. 308, sec. 43. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 2. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Planning and coordination of programs on alcoholism and drug abuse. -- Interagency councils.
